title: Create digital gaming account marketplace with admin panel

requirements.text: Implement user authentication system using Internet Identity for buyer accounts
acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate using Internet Identity
Authentication is required before accessing checkout
User sessions persist across page reloads

requirements.text: Create backend data model for products with fields: game name (text), product type (enum: account/currency/clothes), price in GBP (decimal), image URLs (array), quantity available (number), and game category
acceptanceCriteria: Products can be stored and retrieved from backend
Quantity decrements on purchase
Product type accurately distinguishes between accounts, in-game currency, and premium clothes

requirements.text: Build admin panel interface accessible only to admin users for creating, editing, and deleting product listings
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel has forms for all product fields
Only authenticated admin users can access the admin panel
Product images can be uploaded or linked
Admin can view all existing products and edit or delete them

requirements.text: Implement admin-only access control where only designated admin principals can create and manage product listings
acceptanceCriteria: Backend verifies caller is admin before allowing product mutations
Non-admin users receive permission denied errors when attempting admin operations
Admin principals can be configured in backend

requirements.text: Create public storefront interface displaying all products organized by game categories with product cards showing game name, product type, price in GBP, image, and available quantity
acceptanceCriteria: Products are grouped and filterable by game category
Each product card displays all required fields
Prices are formatted with GBP currency symbol
Out of stock products are visually distinguished

requirements.text: Implement shopping cart functionality where authenticated buyers can add products to cart, view cart contents, and adjust quantities
acceptanceCriteria: Cart persists items for authenticated users
Cart displays total price in GBP
Users can remove items or change quantities
Cart validates against available product quantities

requirements.text: Build checkout flow that displays payment instructions for three payment methods: PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto, using payment details configured by admins
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page shows all three payment options
Each payment method displays admin-configured payment information
Order is created in backend upon checkout completion
Product quantities are reserved or decremented on order creation

requirements.text: Create payment configuration section in admin panel where admins can input and update payment details for PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel has editable fields for each payment method's information
Payment details are stored securely in backend
Updated payment information immediately reflects in buyer checkout flow

requirements.text: Implement game category system where admins can create, edit, and delete game categories, and assign products to categories
acceptanceCriteria: Categories can be managed through admin panel
Products can be assigned to one or more categories
Storefront can filter products by category
Empty categories are handled gracefully in the UI

requirements.text: Design a bold, gaming-inspired visual theme with vibrant accent colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography suitable for a marketplace, and a layout that emphasizes product imagery and clear calls-to-action throughout the storefront and admin panel
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme is consistently applied across all pages
Design emphasizes gaming aesthetic while maintaining professional marketplace credibility
Color scheme uses energetic colors other than blue and purple
Typography and spacing support easy product browsing

requirements.text: Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated including hero banner and category icons
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Hero banner displays on storefront homepage
Category icons display alongside category names in navigation and product filters

constraints: Only admins can create, edit, and delete product listings
Buyers must authenticate with Internet Identity before checkout
All prices must be displayed in GBP
Payment processing is manual using admin-configured payment instructions
nonGoals: Automated payment processing or integration with payment gateways
Real-time chat or messaging between buyers and admins
Support for currencies other than GBP

required: Gaming-themed hero banner with marketplace concept, vibrant colors excluding blue and purple (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Placeholder icon for mobile game accounts category (account-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Placeholder icon for in-game currency category (currency-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Placeholder icon for premium clothes category (clothes-icon.dim_128x128.png)
